input_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the canonicalized input payload that was refused

kernel_hash.description: SHA-256 hash identifying the refusing kernel

output_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the override decision payload

signature.description: Detached signature by the override actor

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the override was recorded

anchor_hash.description: Optional external anchoring hash for witness federation
